spell_tooltip.description:
Your Divine Steed lasts for an additional 2 sec.

While active you become immune to movement impairing effects, and you knock back enemies that you move through.
Lightbearer's healing transfer is increased by up to 200% based on your current health. Lower health heals allies for more.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 268,131 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health, or during Avenging Wrath.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Cleanses a friendly target, removing all Poison and Disease effects.
Lay on Hands grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec and now ignores healing reduction effects.
Hammer of Justice's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.

Forces an enemy target to meditate, incapacitating them for 1 min. Damage may cancel the effect.

Usable against Humanoids, Demons, Undead, Dragonkin, and Giants.
After Cleanse Toxins successfully removes an effect from an ally, they are healed for 278,617.
After you spend 20 Holy Power, your next Word of Glory echoes onto a nearby ally at 30% effectiveness.
Leap atop your Charger for 7 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.

Judgment causes the target to take 40% increased damage from your next Holy Power ability.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Speed increased by 2% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 2%.

Instantly cast Avenger's Shield on up to 5 targets within 30 yds.

Generates 1 Holy Power per target hit.
Armor increased by 20%, Stamina increased by 20% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 12%.
After casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Avenger's Shield every 5 sec for 15 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Spellwarding.
Your Consecration is 15% larger, and enemies within it have 50% reduced movement speed.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Holy Power spending abilities have a 15% chance to make your next Holy Power spending ability free and deal 15% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Ardent Defender, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Shield of the Righteous heals you and up to 2 nearby allies for 1.0% of maximum health.

Divine Steed reduces the cooldown of 4 nearby ally's major movement ability by 3.0 sec.

Your movement speed is increased by 3%.
Judgment causes the next 5 successful attacks against the target to heal the attacker for 15,957.
Shield of the Righteous grants 5% bonus armor for 4.5 sec.
Mastery increased by 4% and strength increased by 4%.
Consecration heals you and 5 allies within it for 4,597 every 0.9 sec.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 30% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.
10% of all healing done to you from other sources heals up to 4 nearby allies, divided evenly among them.

Removing harmful effects with Divine Shield heals you for 10% for each effect removed.  This heal cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Divine Shield may now be cast while Forbearance is active.

Hurls your shield at an enemy target, dealing 106,473 Holy damage, interrupting and silencing the non-Player target for 3 sec, and then jumping to 4 additional nearby enemies. 

Shields you for 8 sec, absorbing 60% as much damage as it dealt.

Deals 22,776 additional damage to all enemies within 5 yds of each target hit.
Your block chance is increased by 20%, you are able to block spells, and your successful blocks deal 16,005 Holy damage to your attacker.

Throws a Blessed Hammer that spirals outward, dealing 27,552 Holy damage to enemies and reducing the next damage they deal to you by 26,183.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
When Shield of the Righteous expires, gain 10% block chance and deal 32,183 Holy damage to all attackers for 4 sec.

When you avoid a melee attack or use Blessed Hammer, you have a 20% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Avenger's Shield and increase your Strength by 2% for 8 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 3 sec.
Every 3 Shields of the Righteous make your next Word of Glory cost no Holy Power. Maximum 2 stacks.
Grand Crusader's chance to occur is increased to 20% and it grants you 2% strength for 8 sec.

Reduces all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.

While Ardent Defender is active, the next attack that would otherwise kill you will instead bring you to 20% of your maximum health.
When you use Avenger's Shield, your block chance is increased by 10% for 10 sec.
Avenger's Shield also shields you for 8 sec, absorbing 60% as much damage as it dealt, up to 50% of your maximum health.
Ardent Defender reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.

Word of Glory heals for an additional 20% over 10 sec.

Increased by 100% if cast on yourself while you are afflicted by a harmful damage over time effect.
Your Avenger's Shield is imbued with holy fire, causing it to deal 22,776 Holy damage to all enemies within 5 yards of each target hit.
Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, allowing Hammer of Wrath to be used on any target, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 20% for 20 sec.
Casting Word of Glory grants you an additional 30% block chance for 6 sec.
Avenger's Shield jumps to 2 additional targets.
Your Blessed Hammer deals 20% increased damage.
Empowers you with the spirit of ancient kings, reducing all damage you take by 50% for 8 sec.
Judgment now has 2 charges, and Grand Crusader now also reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 3 sec.
When Avenger's Shield strikes a single enemy, it deals 100% additional Holy damage.
Your Lay on Hands, Divine Shield, Blessing of Protection, and Blessing of Spellwarding have 15% reduced cooldown.
For each target hit by Avenger's Shield, gain 3% parry for 15 sec.
Releases a blinding flash from your shield, causing 364,960 Holy damage to all nearby enemies within 8 yds and reducing all damage they deal to you by 25% for 6 sec.
Each 3 Holy Power you spend reduces the cooldown of Ardent Defender and Divine Shield by 1.0 sec.
For the next 15 sec, you generate an absorb shield for 25% of all damage you deal, and Avenger's Shield damage is increased by 20% and its cooldown is reduced by 75%.
Avenger's Shield increases the damage of your next Shield of the Righteous by 20% for each target hit by Avenger's Shield, stacking up to 5 times, and increases its radius by 6 yds.
Eye of Tyr deals 300% increased damage and has 33% reduced cooldown.
During Divine Shield, all targets within 15 yds are taunted.

Eye of Tyr is replaced with Hammer of Light for 20 sec after it is cast.

 Hammer of Light:
Hammer down your enemy with the power of the Light, dealing 830,425 Holy damage and 415,632 Holy damage up to 4 nearby enemies. 

Additionally, calls down Empyrean Hammers from the sky to strike 3 nearby enemies for 67,233 Holy damage each.

Costs 5 Holy Power.
Hammer of Light instantly calls down 2 Empyrean Hammers on your target when it is cast.
After casting Hammer of Light, you call down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby target every 2 sec, for 8 sec.

When Empyrean Hammer critically strikes, 100% of its damage is dealt to nearby enemies.

Enemies hit by this effect deal 5% reduced damage to you for 8 sec.

Eye of Tyr surrounds you with a Holy barrier for 15% of your maximum health.

Hammer of Light heals you for 15% of your maximum health, increased by 2% for each additional target hit. Any overhealing done with this effect gets converted into a Holy barrier instead.
Crusader Strike, Hammer of Wrath and Judgment extend the duration of Shake the Heavens by 1 sec.
Divine Steed lasts 2 sec longer and increases your movement speed by an additional 30% for the first 3 sec.
Calling down an Empyrean Hammer has a 10% chance to reset the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.

Shield of the Righteous and Word of Glory calls down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby enemy.

While Shake the Heavens is active, this effect calls down an additional Empyrean Hammer.

Hammer of Light grants Shield of the Righteous, erupts a Consecration beneath its target, and increases your Haste by 12% for 6 sec.

Additionally, Eye of Tyr grants 3 Holy Power.

You gain a stack of Light's Deliverance when you call down an Empyrean Hammer.

While Eye of Tyr and Hammer of Light are unavailable, you consume 60 stacks of Light's Deliverance, empowering yourself to cast Hammer of Light an additional time for free.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 258,326 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health, or during Avenging Wrath.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Cleanses a friendly target, removing all Poison and Disease effects.
Hammer of Justice's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.

Forces an enemy target to meditate, incapacitating them for 1 min. Damage may cancel the effect.

Usable against Humanoids, Demons, Undead, Dragonkin, and Giants.
Leap atop your Charger for 7 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.

Judgment causes the target to take 40% increased damage from your next Holy Power ability.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Instantly cast Avenger's Shield on up to 5 targets within 30 yds.

Generates 1 Holy Power per target hit.
Armor increased by 20%, Stamina increased by 20% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 12%.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.
After casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Avenger's Shield every 5 sec for 15 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Spellwarding.

Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Holy Power spending abilities have 2% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Protection and Blessing of Spellwarding by 60 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Ardent Defender, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Shield of the Righteous grants 5% bonus armor for 4.5 sec.
Hammer of Wrath and Judgment deal 5% additional damage and extend the duration of Avenging Wrath by 0.3 sec.
Melee and ranged attackers receive 50,058 Holy damage each time they strike you during Ardent Defender and Divine Shield.

Hurls your shield at an enemy target, dealing 106,932 Holy damage, interrupting and silencing the non-Player target for 3 sec, and then jumping to 4 additional nearby enemies. 

Shields you for 8 sec, absorbing 60% as much damage as it dealt.

Deals 22,776 additional damage to all enemies within 5 yds of each target hit.
Your block chance is increased by 20%, you are able to block spells, and your successful blocks deal 15,892 Holy damage to your attacker.

Generates 1 Holy Power.

Reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 3 sec.

Grand Crusader's chance to occur is increased to 20% and it grants you 2% strength for 8 sec.

Reduces all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.

While Ardent Defender is active, the next attack that would otherwise kill you will instead bring you to 20% of your maximum health.
When you use Avenger's Shield, your block chance is increased by 10% for 10 sec.
Avenger's Shield also shields you for 8 sec, absorbing 60% as much damage as it dealt, up to 50% of your maximum health.

Word of Glory heals for an additional 20% over 10 sec.

Casting Word of Glory grants you an additional 30% block chance for 6 sec.

Avenger's Shield increases the damage of your next Shield of the Righteous by 20% for each target hit by Avenger's Shield, stacking up to 5 times, and increases its radius by 6 yds.
Eye of Tyr deals 300% increased damage and has 33% reduced cooldown.
During Divine Shield, all targets within 15 yds are taunted.
Hammer of Light instantly calls down 2 Empyrean Hammers on your target when it is cast.
After casting Hammer of Light, you call down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby target every 2 sec, for 8 sec.

When Empyrean Hammer critically strikes, 100% of its damage is dealt to nearby enemies.

Enemies hit by this effect deal 5% reduced damage to you for 8 sec.

Eye of Tyr surrounds you with a Holy barrier for 15% of your maximum health.

Hammer of Light heals you for 15% of your maximum health, increased by 2% for each additional target hit. Any overhealing done with this effect gets converted into a Holy barrier instead.
Crusader Strike, Hammer of Wrath and Judgment extend the duration of Shake the Heavens by 1 sec.
Divine Steed lasts 2 sec longer and increases your movement speed by an additional 30% for the first 3 sec.
Calling down an Empyrean Hammer has a 10% chance to reset the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.

Shield of the Righteous and Word of Glory calls down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby enemy.

While Shake the Heavens is active, this effect calls down an additional Empyrean Hammer.

Additionally, Eye of Tyr grants 3 Holy Power.

You gain a stack of Light's Deliverance when you call down an Empyrean Hammer.

While Eye of Tyr and Hammer of Light are unavailable, you consume 60 stacks of Light's Deliverance, empowering yourself to cast Hammer of Light an additional time for free.
Every 5 sec the healing done by your next Light of Dawn is increased by 20%. Stacks up to 5 times.

When you Cleanse an ally, 1 ally within 40 yds is dispelled of the same effects, but the cooldown of Cleanse is increased by 4 sec.

Healing allies with your Flash of Light or Holy Light will cleanse all Diseases and Poisons from the target.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 259,526 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health, or during Avenging Wrath.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Cleanse additionally removes all Disease and Poison effects.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yds, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
After you spend 20 Holy Power, your next Word of Glory echoes onto a nearby ally at 30% effectiveness.
Leap atop your Charger for 7 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.
Judgment deems the target unworthy, preventing the next 128,164 damage dealt by the target.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.

Divine Steed also grants Blessing of Freedom for 3.0 sec.

 Blessing of Freedom:
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Speed increased by 2% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 2%.

Instantly cast Avenger's Shield on up to 5 targets within 30 yds.

Generates 1 Holy Power per target hit.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.
After casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Avenger's Shield every 5 sec for 15 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Spellwarding.
Your Consecration is 15% larger, and enemies within it have 50% reduced movement speed.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Holy Power spending abilities have 2% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Protection and Blessing of Spellwarding by 60 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Ardent Defender, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Judgment causes the next 5 successful attacks against the target to heal the attacker for 16,385.
Melee and ranged attackers receive 50,058 Holy damage each time they strike you during Ardent Defender and Divine Shield.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 30% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.

Triggers a burst of Light on the target, dealing 309,863 Holy damage to an enemy, or 291,286 healing to an ally.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Word of Glory and Light of Dawn gain up to 30% additional chance to critically strike, based on their target's current health. Lower health targets are more likely to be critically struck.
Unleashes a wave of Holy energy, healing up to 5 injured allies within a 15 yd frontal cone for 175,479.
Holy Shock now has 2 charges and it refunds 50% of its mana cost when cast on an enemy.

Empowers your chosen aura for 8 sec.

Devotion Aura: Damage reduction increased to 12%.
Mastery: Lightbringer now increases your healing based on the target's proximity to either you or your Beacon of Light, whichever is closer.
Casting Flash of Light or Holy Light grants 1 Holy Power.
Each Holy Power spent on Word of Glory increases the healing of your next Light of Dawn by 5%, up to a maximum of 45%.
Holy Shock, Holy Light, and Flash of Light critical healing increased by 20%.
Holy Light heals up to 5 targets within 12 yds for 8% of its healing.

Fires a beam of light that scatters to strike a clump of targets. 

If the beam is aimed at an enemy target, it deals 932,866 Holy damage and radiates 719,288 healing to 5 allies within 30 yds.

If the beam is aimed at a friendly target, it heals for 1.6 million and radiates 352,686 Holy damage to 5 enemies within 30 yds.
The cooldown of Aura Mastery is reduced by 30 sec.
Consuming Infusion of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 1.0 sec.
After casting Barrier of Faith or Holy Prism, the healing of your next Holy Light or Flash of Light is increased by 20%, its cast time is reduced by 30%, and its mana cost is reduced by 50%.

When an ally with your Beacon of Light is damaged below 50% health, they absorb the next 835,853 damage.

You cannot shield the same person this way twice within 1 min.
Allies with Beacon of Light receive 5% less damage.
30% of Holy Shock's overhealing is converted into an absorb shield. The shield amount cannot exceed 10% of your max health.
Word of Glory and Light of Dawn have a chance equal to your haste to reduce the cost of your next Holy Light, Crusader Strike, or Judgment by 6,000.
Beacon of Light transfers an additional 5% of the amount healed.
Spending Holy Power has a 25% chance to trigger Saved by the Light's absorb effect at 33% effectiveness without activating its cooldown.
Holy Shock and Judgment have a 8% increased critical strike chance.
Mark a second target as a Beacon, mimicking the effects of Beacon of Light. Your heals will now heal both of your Beacons, but at 30% reduced effectiveness.
Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, allowing Hammer of Wrath to be used on any target, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 20% for 20 sec.

Releases the Light within yourself, healing 5 injured allies instantly and an injured ally every 0.9 sec for 20 sec within 40 yds for 32,598.

Allies healed also receive 12% increased healing from your Holy Light, Flash of Light, and Holy Shock spells for 12 sec.
Avenging Wrath now causes Judgment to generate 1 additional Holy Power, and its duration is increased by 25%.
Spending Holy Power grants you 1% haste per finisher for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

After casting Avenging Wrath, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.

After casting Divine Toll, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.

Bless an ally for 30 sec, causing 12% of all healing to be converted into damage onto a nearby enemy and 12% of all damage to be converted into healing onto an injured ally within 40 yds.

Blessing of the Seasons: Turns to Autumn after use.

Infusion of Light has 1 additional charge, increases Greater Judgment's effect by an additional 50%, Flash of Light's healing is increased by an additional 15%, and Holy Light's healing is increased by an additional 15%.

Your Holy Shock, Flash of Light, and Holy Light spells extend the duration of Tyr's Deliverance on yourself when cast on targets affected by Tyr's Deliverance.

Holy Shock: Extends 2.0 sec.

Flash of Light: Extends 4.0 sec.

 Holy Light: Extends 8.0 sec.

Tyr's Deliverance can be extended up to a maximum of 40 sec.
While a Dawnlight is active, your Holy Power spenders deal 5% additional damage or healing.

Heals an ally for 292,548 and an additional 98,948 over 16 sec.

Healing increased by 25% when cast on self.
Dawnlight reduces the movement speed of enemies by 50% and increases the movement speed of allies by 20%.
Your damage and healing over time effects have a chance to increase the
After you cast , gain Divine Purpose.
Your Haste is increased by 2% for 12 sec each time you apply Dawnlight. Multiple stacks may overlap.

During Avenging Wrath, you become linked to your Dawnlights, causing 30,893 Radiant damage to enemies or 17,302 healing to allies that pass through the beams, reduced beyond 5 targets.

Activating Avenging Wrath applies up to 2 Dawnlights onto nearby allies or enemies and increases Dawnlight's duration by 20%.
Lightbearer's healing transfer is increased by up to 200% based on your current health. Lower health heals allies for more.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Generates 1 Holy Power.

Hammer of Justice's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.

After you spend 20 Holy Power, your next Word of Glory echoes onto a nearby ally at 30% effectiveness.

Judgment causes the target to take 40% increased damage from your next Holy Power ability.

Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Holy Power spending abilities have 2% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Ardent Defender, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Judgment causes the next 5 successful attacks against the target to heal the attacker for 16,113.
Melee and ranged attackers receive 50,058 Holy damage each time they strike you during Ardent Defender and Divine Shield.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 30% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.

Pierce an enemy with a blade of light, dealing 190,511 Holy damage.

Generates 1 Holy Power.

Unleashes a whirl of divine energy, dealing 165,804 Holy damage to all nearby enemies. 

Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Unleashes a powerful weapon strike that deals 272,499 Holy damage to an enemy target,

Final Verdict has a 15% chance to reset the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.

Templar's Verdict and Blade of Justice deal 10% increased damage.

The range of Blade of Justice is increased to 20 yds.
Your Consecration is 15% larger, and enemies within it have 50% reduced movement speed.
Judgment now has 2 charges.

Blade of Justice casts Consecration at the target's location.

This effect can only occur every 10 sec.
When you cast Word of Glory on someone other than yourself, you are also healed for 50% of the amount healed.

Blade of Justice now hits nearby enemies for 165,248 Holy damage. 

Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Mastery: Highlord's Judgment is 50% more effective on Judgment and Hammer of Wrath. Judgment applies an additional stack of Greater Judgment if it is known.
Your Blessed Hammer deals 20% increased damage.

Lash out at your enemies, dealing 420,172 Radiant damage to all enemies within 14 yds in front of you, and applying Truth's Wake, burning the targets for an additional 232,799 damage over 9 sec.

Demon and Undead enemies are also stunned for 5 sec.

Generates 3 Holy Power.
Divine Protection reduces damage you take by an additional 20%.

Call down a blast of heavenly energy, dealing 715,559 Holy damage to all targets in the area and causing them to take 30% increased damage from your single target Holy Power abilities, and 15% increased damage from other Holy Power abilities for 12 sec.
Final Reckoning and Execution Sentence's durations are increased by 4 sec.
Final Reckoning and Execution Sentence grant 3 Holy Power.

Avenging Wrath is replaced with Radiant Glory.

Radiant Glory
Wake of Ashes activates Avenging Wrath for 8 sec.

Each Holy Power spent has a chance to activate Avenging Wrath for 4 sec.

Highlord's Judgment and Radiant damage abilities have a chance to call down an explosion of Holy Fire dealing 254,893 Radiant damage to all nearby enemies and leaving a Consecration in its wake. 

Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
